CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND ( Product_Code_Copy__c = "HW-VG34-EU", DATEVALUE( Opportunity.Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c ) >= DATE(2019,03,04) ), AND ( Product_Code_Copy__c = "HW-VG34", DATEVALUE( Opportunity.Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c ) >= DATE(2019,02,18) )), 1,0)
CustomField.label: New VG - 34 Number
